participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Liam is hardworking and practical, with a touch of creativity reflected in his love for gardening. He can be a bit anxious and has a vivid imagination, especially when it comes to his fears.
participant_1.background: i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Margaret is wise and nurturing, with a love for knowledge and exploration. She enjoys sharing stories of her travels and has a gentle demeanor.
participant_2.background: i think i will retire in a few years. i really like to travel. i have visited spain a times. i am a librarian. i'm 60years old.
